ca.uqac.lif.labpal.plot

Class Plot

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.uqac.lif.labpal.plot.Plot
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GnuPlot, GralPlot

    public abstract class Plot
extends Object
    A representation of data into a picture
    Author:
    Sylvain Hall√©

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  Plot.ImageType
      The image type used for displaying the plot

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Palette EGA
      A 16-color preset palette for qualitative data, corresponding to the 16 EGA colors.
      protected int m_id
      The plot's ID
      protected Laboratory m_lab
      The lab that contains the experiments this plot is drawing
      protected Palette m_palette
      The palette used to draw the data series for this plot
      protected Table m_table
      The table this plot is based on
      protected String m_title
      The plot's title

      A table transformation to apply before plotting

      An 8-color preset palette for qualitative data: ■ ■ ■ ■ ■ ■ ■ ■
      static byte[] s_blankImage
      The bytes of a blank image, used as a placeholder when no plot can be drawn

    • Field Detail

      • QUALITATIVE_1

        public static final transient Palette QUALITATIVE_1
        An 8-color preset palette for qualitative data: ■ ■ ■ ■ ■ ■ ■ ■

        This palette corresponds to the preset Set1.ptl from gnuplot-colorbrewer.

      • QUALITATIVE_2

        public static final transient Palette QUALITATIVE_2
        An 8-color preset palette for qualitative data: ■ ■ ■ ■ ■ ■ ■ ■

        This palette corresponds to the preset Set2.ptl from gnuplot-colorbrewer.

      • QUALITATIVE_3

        public static final transient Palette QUALITATIVE_3
        An 8-color preset palette for qualitative data: ■ ■ ■ ■ ■ ■ ■ ■

        This palette corresponds to the preset Set3.ptl from gnuplot-colorbrewer.

      • EGA

        public static final transient Palette EGA
        A 16-color preset palette for qualitative data, corresponding to the 16 EGA colors.

      • processTable

        public DataTable processTable(DataTable table)
        Transforms a data table before being plotted. A plot can override this method to perform pre-processing of the table.

        Returns:
        The transformed table
